reviewText: What a gritty revelation of the lesbian world for black women.  I found it educational and emotional at the same time. It does not tell much of a story...the usual relational hiccups but the context is arresting. I recommend it for those who have little understanding or compassion for gay black women....unless you are someone who wants to remain in ignorance and simply pigeon-hole fellow human beings.
'Interesting' is most definitely the best way I would chose to describe this video compilation of Cheryl Dunye's earliest works.
